text: 10:13 Daniel 10:20-21; 12:1; Jut 1:9; Akar Mogomem 12:7Kɨ zuamɨra izasa, ezɨ puvatɨ. Aser kurar Persian nguibar ekiam gativazim, 21plan dughiabar nan tɨvazɨ kɨ ike. Ezɨ kɨ uabɨra Persian atriviba ko itima gumazir nan akurvaghamiba puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, enselbar faragha zuir enselɨn mam, an ziam Maikel, a nan akuraghasa ize.10:13 Hibrun akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
